description: Make a directed graph acyclic by reversing some edges. Graphviz filters: acyclic, bcomps, comps, edgepaint, gvcolor, gvpack, mingle, nop, sccmap, tred, & unflatten. More information: https://graphviz.org/pdf/acyclic.1.pdf.

useCases.description: Make a directed graph acyclic by reversing some edges:
